text: Gei Joshua, tama a Jehozadak, mo ono ehoo gau hai mee dabu, mo Zerubbabel, tama a Shealtiel, mo ono gau huogodoo, digaula gu haga duu aga labelaa di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha o di God o Israel belee hai ai nadau tigidaumaha dudu, be di hai dela guu lawa di hihi i lodo Nnaganoho Moses, tangada hai hegau a God.3.2 Exodus 27.1
